attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a society we are increasingly seeing child killers not only being given appauling sentences, but being given new identites and a new home in another country upon their release, all at the taxpayers expense. As good british citizens, we (the public) want to see these rights for child killers abolished.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to refuse child killers new identites.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Nonewidentites


Her Majesty's Government
